subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Everyone seems to have an opinion on whether American Pharoah will become the 12th thoroughbred to sweep the Kentucky Derby, the Preakness Stakes and the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: Everyone seems to have an opinion on whether American Pharoah will become the 12th thoroughbred to sweep the Kentucky Derby, the Preakness Stakes and the Belmont Stakes.
